title: I found an electronic typewriter T40 for free. When I type, all I see are the imprints of the words, but no ink. Do I just need an ink cartridge or a ribbon too? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it will need either a ribbon reel, ribbon cartridge, or some other type ink printing medium, it depends on what it uses.     Usually the top cover will fold or lift to gain access to the ribbon. The ribbon is what goes in front of the striking keys as they hit the paper.  You say it is a T40 but you also need the make too. Often you can get the ink ribbons at office supply warehouses or print businesses.

If it has a ribbon cartridge you will likely need it. Open it up and see what is involved. That is pretty dated, I would look on “Utube” for a service video. You may need to clean it and adjust ribbon etc.
